#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define M 1000000007
 
int poww(int a, int b) {
	ll x=1,y=a;
	while(b) {
		if(b&1) x = x*y % M;
		y = y*y % M;
		b >>= 1;
	}
	return x;
}
 
int main() {
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--) {
		int n;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		if(n==1) {
			printf("1 0\n");
			continue;
		}
		int ans1 = poww(n, n+1);
		int ans2 = poww(n-1, n);
		ans1 = ((ans1-n+1)+M)%M;
		//b += M;
		//b %= M;
		ans2=(ans2-1+M)%M;
		//a -= 1;
		//a += M;
		//a %= M;
		
		printf("%d %d\n",ans1,ans2);
	}
	return 0;
}
